review: ** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* * ****** ************* *** full of positivity! She put me so much at ease and made me feel very confident that I will be able to recover. She is a very ethical practitioner and does not prescibe unwanted tests. My family is so happy about how good I feel after visiting her! I totally recommend her for any gynaecological problems that one maybe facing!
Its an complete saisfacsaisfatory appointment.... I  am soo happy to interact with Doctor.. I will recommend this to the needypeople compulsorily

review: ***** **** *** ****** Very Experienced, Calm soft spoken and Very Competent. She is abreast with the latest in her field.

I had been to hospital and it was for gynaecology related. ****** *** **** ** ********** *** I can surely recommend doctor to others. I had went for normal consultation. There was no waiting time in the hospital.
Ma'am was very nice and friendly. She patiently answered all my questions and gave me appropriate advice
